p: A number of animal models have been used to investigate the etiology of epilepsy and to identify anti-seizure drugs (ASDs) [ 19, 20]. Among these models, the zebrafish ( Danio rerio) is a promising vertebrate model for ASD screening, and has numerous advantages such as small cost, high fecundity, easy handling, light transparency, and high genetic homology to mammals [ 21, 22, 23].
